Your writing's great, dude. Nice fightin' with ya tonight!

::Prowl::

These sets of orders went down much better with Prowl as he continued
to fly after Divebomb. He was gonna rip him apart!



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireBlade::
> FireBlade kept fireing his EMP's knowing that his fire attacks would
> do nothing....
> 
> 
> OOC:
> Thanks man...yea it is easy tp post with yan..he plays fair...no you
> didn't ruin it...made it more interesting....I am also off to
> bed...alter yall
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> > Tantrum backs up, but continues his electric barrage, (can
somebody post
> > for the CF. I shot it with grenades like 50 posts back, and others
have
> > attacked it as well). He then levels his sword and emits a blast
of
> > electricity from it as well, "Sure thing, we'll just improvise
with our
> > trusty can openers" he said, trailing off.
> >
> >
> > OOC: Well guys that was fun. Gunther your a good player, im glad
you

posts. So
> > good in fact, that I kind of feel I ruined it with my shauty
writing, by

the
